description: Theatrum Marcelli (Theater of Marcellus) is an ancient Roman theater in the Circus Flaminius. Augustus completed its construction and dedicated it in 12 BC.

properties.title: OSM Location of Visible Remains of Theater
OSM location of Area archeologica del Teatro di Marcello

locations.title: OSM Location of Visible Remains of Theater
OSM location of Area archeologica del Teatro di Marcello

names.description: Ancient Latin name of the theater as recorded on the marble plan of Rome and reflected (but sometimes only in editorial supplement) in a few other inscriptions.
